en-US.summary: Listen to White Label Radio, less bla bla bla, more la la la.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask White Label Radio to play
en-US.name: White Label Radio
en-US.description:
Listen to White Label Radio, with less bla bla bla, and more la la la.

White Label Radio provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch White Label Radio" or "Alexa, play white label radio" to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
